comment: Value of a complex number raised to the 0th power. Note that under our definition, ` 0 ^ 0 = 1 ` , following the convention used by Gleason. Part of Definition 10-4.1 of [Gleason] p. 134. (Contributed by NM, 20-May-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jun-2014.)
